content: **file format ** pdf format delivered in uk terms **file size ** approximately 8 mb **device/software compatibility ** compatible with devices supporting pdf readers such as adobe acrobat on smartphones tablets and computers **internet requirements ** an internet connection is needed for downloading the file after purchase **usage instructions** **how to download and prerequisites** **usage instructions** complete your purchase on etsy ravelry or shopify download the pdf file from the confirmation email or your account s download section open the file on any pdf-compatible device and follow the pattern instructions **prerequisites ** basic crochet knowledge including how to work single_crochet single_crochet and double_crochet double_crochet stitches required tools crochet hook size specified in the pattern yarn scissors and a yarn needle **safety and compliance** **compliance ** this pattern complies with the general product safety regulation gpsr **precautions ** not suitable for children under 16 without adult supervision ensure your device can open pdf files before purchase **disclaimer ** this product is for educational and personal use only **customer support** if you have any questions or encounter issues with the pattern please contact us at help@bellacococrochet com support hours monday friday 9 am 4 pm gmt response time within 48 hours **refund policy** due to the nature of digital downloads refunds or exchanges are not available please review all product details before purchase **licensing and permissions** licensing terms this pattern is for personal use only you may not redistribute resell or share this pattern in any form restrictions finished products made from this pattern may be sold but credit to dakota drawstring bag pattern by bella coco crochet is appreciated mass production is prohibited **updates and maintenance** includes free updates for any corrections or clarifications updates will be sent via email or can be downloaded from your account if purchased via etsy please email help@bellacococrochet com if you require updated files **legal and manufacturer contact information** bella coco crochet ltd 6 clinton avenue nottingham england ng5 1aw help@bellacococrochet com eu representative eucomply oü pärnu mnt 139b-14 11317 tallinn estonia hello@eucompliancepartner com +33757690241 privacy policy https
